title: BRIEF-Mahindra And Mahindra's Anand Mahindra Set To Take Over As Non-Exec Chairperson - CNBC TV18
text:
BRIEF-Mahindra And Mahindra's Anand Mahindra Set To Take Over As Non-Exec Chairperson - CNBC TV18

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 22, 2019 21:12)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mahindra And Mahindra's Anand Mahindra Set To Take Over As Non-Exec Chairperson - CNBC TV18 Oct 22 (Reuters) - * MAHINDRA AND MAHINDRA'S ANAND MAHINDRA SET TO TAKE OVER AS NON-EXEC CHAIRPERSON - CNBC TV18 * MAHINDRA AND MAHINDRA'S ANISH SHAH MAY SUCCEED PAWAN GOENKA AS THE MANAGING DIRECTOR - CNBC TV18 Further company coverage: MAHM.NS
